title.string: Teorema pythagorean ed il relativo uso.
Πυθαγορικό θεώρημα και η χρήση του.

BEGIN:VCARD VERSION:3.0 N:V;Tanya;;; FN:Tanya V ORG: END:VCARD

description.string: 1. From the history of the mathematics ( usage of Calibrate resources’ slides) – a few words about Pythagoras, his life and creation is presented to students. 2. Description of right triangle and its legs ( usage of Calibrate resources’ illustrations). 3. Pythagorean Theorem’s formulation(Calibrate resources): a) presentation of its geometrical interpretation b) illustration of Theorem’s proof 4. Students are given – as an interesting fact – characteristics of some numbers ( so-called ‘Pythagorean’s threes’: 3,4,5 or 5,12,13). 5. Usage of Pythagorean Theorem-Special Triangles ( Maths for Morons). 6. Wide scope of Pythagoream Theorem’s usage in geometry is shown to students, they do some practice: make calculations of missing right triangle’s leg; diagonals of square, rectangle, trapezium and rombhus; height of given figures (usage of Calibrate resources – Pitagorov izrek) – in order to find the figures’ area and peripheries.
